messages.message:
PSA: if you see `500` errors in your Cypress CI runs with an `Internal Server Error` error message (see screenshots), you’re probably running into this crafting issue (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1715213021687789)

you’ll need to inspect the network requests in your failed Cypress tests to see why the tests in your CI run failed - it’s possible that Cypress tests are failing for other reasons, not these 500 errors

in these situations, we recommend the following
1. delete the sandbox
    a. go to `https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/pr-<your pr number>` 
    b. click “Delete”
2. re-run all Cypress CI jobs via the Github UI
    a. click on “Details” for one of the Cypress jobs on your PR
    b. click “Re-run jobs” -> click “Re-run all jobs”
        i. You must rerun all jobs for your sandbox to be redeployed and for a new Cypress CI run to start!
